name: Orc Clans
background: The Orc Clans are a band of roving orcs who scrap, fight and die for the glory of it. Their origin is still unknown, but they are spread across the galaxy in wide numbers. Orcs usually gather with a steady amount of goblins who act as the workers and some even pilot goblin mech creations.

goblin_army.name: Goblin Focus
goblin_army.background: An Orc Clan with an abundance of powerful and well-equipped goblins.

grand_warlord.name: Grand Warlord
grand_warlord.description: A massive clan leader in very heavy armor.

warlord.name: Warlord
warlord.description: The clan leader and toughest orc boss.

mechanic.name: Mechanic
mechanic.description: An orc with a knack for scrapping and fixing things.

warbanner_boss.name: Warbanner Boss
warbanner_boss.description: An orc carrying a war banner to inspire the orcs.

mad_doctor.name: Mad Doctor
mad_doctor.description: An orc with a knack for fixing up the wounded.

shaman.name: Shaman
shaman.description: A strange orc with psychic powers.

goblin_leader.name: Goblin Leader
goblin_leader.description: A strange orc with psychic powers.

goblin_doctor.name: Goblin Doctor
goblin_doctor.description: A Goblin with a knack for fixing up the wounded.

goblin_mechanic.name: Goblin Mechanic
goblin_mechanic.description: A Goblin with a knack for scrapping and fixing things.

goblin_veterans.name: Goblin Veterans
goblin_veterans.description: A herd of veteran goblin fighters.

storm_orcs.name: Storm Orcs
storm_orcs.description: A group of angry orcs equipped with jetpacks.

specialist_orcs.name: Specialist Orcs
specialist_orcs.description: A group of orcs who can be equipped to specialize in specific combat roles.

pirate_orcs.name: Orc Pirates
pirate_orcs.description: A group of orcs ready to pillage and blunder.

boss_mob.name: Boss Mob
boss_mob.description: A group of orcs bosses ready to cause maximum havoc.

ultra_bosses.name: Ultra Bosses
ultra_bosses.description: A group of orcs bosses that are heavily armored and dangerous.

biker_mob.name: Biker Mob
biker_mob.description: A group of angry orcs on bikes.

boss_bikers.name: Boss Bikers
boss_bikers.description: A group of orcs bosses mounted on bikes.

boss_trike.name: Boss Trike
boss_trike.description: A tough warboss mounted on a battle war trike.

orc_minicopter.name: Orc Minicopter
orc_minicopter.description: A miniature helicopter for quick and deadly air attacks.

truck.name: Truck
truck.description: A ramshackled truck held together only by sheer will.

war_helicopter.name: War Helicopter
war_helicopter.description: A ramshackled helicopter held together only by sheer will.

looted_tank.name: Looted Tank
looted_tank.description: A tank build out of various parts taken from other wrecked vehicles.

battle_truck.name: Battle Truck
battle_truck.description: A grand battle truck build out of various parts taken from other wrecked vehicles.

goblin_tank.name: Goblin Tanks
goblin_tank.description: A small tank squadron built and crewed by goblins.

goblin_mega_tank.name: Goblin Mega Tank
goblin_mega_tank.description: A huge tank built and crewed by goblins.

goblin_walker.name: Goblin Walkers
goblin_walker.description: A small walker group built and crewed by goblins.

orc_walker.name: Orc Walker
orc_walker.description: A larger and more deadly walker built and piloted by orcs.

attack_buggy.name: Attack Buggy
attack_buggy.description: A multi-purpose speedy buggy for quick harassment.

dragster_buggy.name: Dragster Buggy
dragster_buggy.description: A teleporting speedy buggy that packs a punch.

beast_buggy.name: Beast Buggy
beast_buggy.description: A buggy carrying a payload of beasts for launching.

blaster_buggy.name: Blaster Buggy
blaster_buggy.description: A buggy equipped with longer-range fire support weapons.

snazz_buggy.name: Snazz Buggy
snazz_buggy.description: A buggy equipped with a large fancy gun for taking out many targets.

jet_buggy.name: Jet Buggy
jet_buggy.description: A fast buggy equipped for hunting tanks.

goblin_artillery.name: Goblin Artillery
goblin_artillery.description: A battery of small artillery guns built by goblins.

blaster_plane.name: Blaster Plane
blaster_plane.description: An aircraft designed for destroying tanks.

flame_bomber.name: Flame Bomber
flame_bomber.description: An aircraft designed for close-attack inferno bombing runs.

blitz_bomber.name: Blitz Bomber
blitz_bomber.description: An aircraft designed for close-attack heavy bombing runs.

attack_plane.name: Attack Plane
attack_plane.description: An aircraft designed for ground support firepower.

heavy_walker.name: Orc Heavy Walker
heavy_walker.description: A large walker with multiple heavy upgrades.

super_heavy_walker.name: Super Heavy Walker
super_heavy_walker.description: A masive walker with multiple heavy upgrades.

orc_idol.name: Orc Idol
orc_idol.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 6" gain +1 Courage.

ultra_armor.name: Ultra Armor
ultra_armor.description: This model gets +2 Resist and -2" of movement.

energy_field.name: Energy Field
energy_field.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 3" get +2 Defense.

war!.name: WAR!
war!.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 3" get +2" of Movement.

biggest_boss.name: The Biggest Boss
biggest_boss.description: Whenever this model loses a wound, roll a D10. On a 5 or less that wound is not lost.

mad_doctor.name: Mad Doctor
mad_doctor.description: Whenever this model, or a friend Infatry model within 3" loses a wound, roll a D10. On a 2 or less that wound is not lost.

war_banner.name: War Banner
war_banner.description: This model and friendly Infantry units within 3" gain +1 Strength.

warpath.name: Warpath
warpath.description: The next time target friendly unit fights, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.

crackling_bolt.name: Crackling Bolt
crackling_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 6" takes 4 hits with AP 1.

headbang.name: Headbang
headbang.description: The next time target friendly unit fights, hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +2 AP.

deathbolt.name: Death
deathbolt.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP 4 and damage 3.

teleport.name: Jump Teleport
teleport.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately move up to 12" ignoring models and terrain.

psychic_vomit.name: Psychic Vomit
psychic_vomit.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 4 hits with AP 2.

relics.flavor: A deadly ultra claw with the power to rip anything to shreds.
A true warlord knows how to inspire and this war chant does this and more.
A powerful looking banner can inspire strength some didn't even know they had.

war!.name: WAR!
war!.description: Choose one unit. That unit adds +2" to its movement stat this round.

group_up.name: Group Up
group_up.description: Use before activating an Infantry unit within 2" of another of the same unit. The two units merge and, for the rest of the battle, they are counted as a single unit for all rules purposes. This may not bring a unit above its maximum size.

full_speed.name: Full Speed
full_speed.description: Use when a Vehicle is declared to charge an enemy unit. That Vehicle gains +3 Impact.

scrap_armor.name: Scrap Armor
scrap_armor.description: Use when activating an Infantry unit. If that unit ends its activation within 3" of a destroyed vehicle it may choose not to shoot or fight but gain +1 Resist (to a maximum of 7) for the rest of the battle.

grab_on.name: Grab On
grab_on.description: Use when a Vehicle with the Transport keyword is activated. One friendly infantry unit within 3" may be picked up and moved within 3" of the vehicle's final location.

goblin_shield.name: Goblin Shield
goblin_shield.description: Use after an Infantry unit has been hit by a ranged weapon. For this attack, you can roll a D10 each time an attack made with a ranged weapon hits that unit if there is a friendly Goblin Herd unit within 5" of it, and the Goblin Herd unit is closer to the attacking model than the target unit. On an 8 or less a hit is transferred to the Goblin Herd instead of the original target.

never_surrender.name: Never Surrender
never_surrender.description: Use after a Character has been killed. That unit may shoot or fight if it has not yet activated, after which it is removed.

force_field_projector.name: Force Field Projector
force_field_projector.description: Use at the start of the round. Choose a unit with the 'Force Field' rule. For the rest of the round, that force field applies to friendly units within 5".

spread_out.name: Spread Out
spread_out.description: Use before activating an Infantry unit. That unit may be split into two units of no less than 5 models.
spread_out.flavor: Goblins often split off into small raiding units in order to cover more ground.

tune_up.name: Tune Up
tune_up.description: Use before shooting with a unit. It gains +3" maximum range with all weapons.
tune_up.flavor: With the turn of a knob or the twisting of a dial, Goblins squeeze out the best in the equipment.

deadly_in_numbers.name: Deadly In Numbers
deadly_in_numbers.description: Use before shooting with an Infantry unit. It gets +1 to hit.
deadly_in_numbers.flavor: With enough Goblins trained on a target, even they can do significant damage.
